data.description:
Create, Collect & Play in Mixed Reality!

Figmin XR is a fun spatial computing application that lets you easily create, collect & play in mixed reality. Multiplayer supported.

Anything is possible! Decorate your room, create physics games, educational experiences, awesome videos for social media, storytelling, art, marketing, visualization, or anything that you can imagine.

We offer a suite of built-in tools:

* Sketch in 3D, powered by Tilt Brush!
* Search and import 3D models, animated GIFs and Videos 
* 3D text editor
* Fully featured physics editor, to bring your creations to life
* Motion editor, animate objects by simply moving them around
* Lighting editor that can illuminate the real world
* Discover Figmin XR user generated content
* Publish your creations
* Browse Reddit 
* Create 3D & 2D models with our voxel editor
* Built in Voxelizer, to transform 3D models and images into fully editable Voxels
* Directly import web-links of images, GIFs, YouTube videos & Sketchfab 3D models

changelog.change_log:
Update 22

- Meet our Web Browser!
It can extract content to view in 3D space as well as create web-apps to use in your scenes.

- We added more shapes to the sketch editor
- 3D model rendering greatly improved
- Support for importing GLB 3D models straight off the web
- Physical keyboard support

Enjoy!

Update 21

Motion editor: Record an object's motion and watch it playback around your room

Relighting: Physics objects can emit light that illuminate your real world room.

Home scene: You can save a scene as "Home" and it will load automatically at startup

Minor changes:
- You can filter Sketchfab search by license
- You can adjust the cache size for Sketchfab models
- Hands in playmode will cast shadows

Update 21

Motion editor: Record an object's motion and watch it playback around your room

Relighting: Physics objects can emit light that illuminate your real world room.

Home scene: You can save a scene as "Home" and it will load automatically at startup

Minor changes:
- You can filter Sketchfab search by license
- You can adjust the cache size for Sketchfab models
- Hands in playmode will cast shadows

Update 21

Motion editor: Record object's motion and watch it play back around your room

Relighting: Physics objects can emit light that illuminate your real world room.

Home scene: You can set a scene to be your home and it will load automatically at startup

Update 20

Mesh room mapping for Quest 3
Audio reactive brushes can be activated with your voice
Enabled super resolution
Voice chat for remote multiplayer
Text editor improvements
You can play multiple videos at a time
Export your sketches as GLTF 3D models
Easier import/export of tilt files
multiplayer room size increased to 16
You can duplicate selected brush strokes easily
Fixed Mixed Reality Capture

Update 20

Mesh room mapping for Quest 3
Audio reactive brushes can be activated with your voice
Enabled super resolution
Voice chat for remote multiplayer
Text editor improvements
You can play multiple videos at a time
Export your sketches as GLTF 3D models
Easier import/export of tilt files
multiplayer room size increased to 16

* Automatic co-location for in-person multiplayer. Requires share point cloud data permission
* New brushes
* Brushes can be filtered by category
* You can add brushes to your favorites category
* GIFs will cast shadows, if the setting is enabled and the image is imported as "Lit"

* Automatic co-location for in-person multiplayer
* New brushes
* Brushes can be filtered by category
* You can add brushes to your favorite category

Update 15

- You can create portals that connect to other scenes
- Physics can be paused 
- Audio reactive haptics
- Better graphics
